name: Top Water
description: Our top water category is like the perfect joke - it will have those fish jumping and gasping for air in no time!

product_subcategories.name: Topwater Stick-baits
product_subcategories.description: Our topwater stick-baits are like the fish version of playing hard to get - they will drive those fish wild and have them begging for more!

products.name: Karnage Crystal Blue Mackerel
products.description: This fishing lure is like a crystal blue ocean, so clear and inviting that even the fish can't resist!

products.name: Karnage Green Mackerel
products.description: This fishing lure is like a green machine, with a realistic fish-scale pattern that will make those fish think they're looking at a real meal!

products.name: Karnage Lava Mackerel
products.description: This fishing lure is like a fiery ball of love, so hot it will have those fish begging for more!

products.name: Karnage Garaboldi
products.description: This fishing lure is like a crazy ex, with multiple hooks that will keep those fish coming back for more, no matter how hard they try to resist!

products.name: Karnage Chrome
products.description: This chrome fishing lure is so shiny, it could blind a fish. Perfect for catching those elusive big ones!

products.name: Karnage Abalone
products.description: This abalone-shell fishing lure is so lifelike, you might catch a mermaid instead of a fish! A must-have for any serious angler.

product_subcategories.name: Surface-Irons
product_subcategories.description: Our surface-iron lures are like the perfect wingman - they will help you catch that fish you have had your eye on and leave you feeling like a true player!

product_subcategories.name: Poppers
product_subcategories.description: These popping lures are so good, they are like a hot bowl of fish soup that will have those fish saying "damn, that is some good eats"!

name: Clothing
description: Our clothing category is like the perfect outfit - it will have you looking good and feeling good, so you can focus on reeling in those big ones!

product_subcategories.name: T-Shirts
product_subcategories.description: Our fishing-themed shirts are like the ultimate power move - they will have you looking so fly, even those fish will want to hang out with you!

product_subcategories.name: Hats
product_subcategories.description: Our fishing-themed hats are like the perfect accessory - they will keep the sun out of your eyes and have you looking cool as a cucumber!

product_subcategories.name: Activewear
product_subcategories.description: Our fishing-themed activewear is like the perfect workout buddy - they will have you reeling in those compliments while you reel in those fish!

name: Trolling
description: Our trolling category is like the ultimate road trip - sit back, relax, and let those fish come to you!

product_subcategories.name: Cider Plugs
product_subcategories.description: These cider plugs are like the fish version of liquid courage - they will make those fish so happy, they will forget all about that other bait they had their eye on!

product_subcategories.name: High-Speed Tuna/Wahoo Lures
product_subcategories.description: Our high-speed lures are like the perfect one-liner - they will catch those fish before they even know what hit them!

product_subcategories.name: Yo-Yo Irons
product_subcategories.description: These yo-yo iron lures are like the perfect dance partner - they will have you up and down and all around until you are reeling in those fish!

product_subcategories.name: Weighted Stick-baits
product_subcategories.description: Our weighted stick-bait lures are like the ultimate pick-up line - they will get those picky fish to bite like it is their last meal!

name: New Arrivals
description: Our new arrivals category is like the ultimate surprise party - you never know what you are going to get, but it is always guaranteed to be a good time!

name: Jigs
description: Our jigs category is like the perfect dance party - let those jigs move and groove, and those fish will be ready to boogie all night long!
